title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 19 §§ 197-3.11 - Auditing
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 19 §§ 197-3.11 - Auditing

State Regulations
A duly authorized designee of the Department of State may
audit any course offered and may verify attendance and inspect the records of
attendance of the course at any time during its presentation or
thereafter. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 19
§§
197-3.11

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
